attacks.name: Jet Punch
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Knuckle Impact
attacks.effect: This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Absorption-GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 damage for each of your remaining Prize cards. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
